summary: Diff updates the SiteHeader and SiteFooter components, including navigation behavior and footer content, and references a stable generated asset path for the logo. However, the diff does not provide evidence that a production build/deploy was actually executed successfully or that all runtime asset 404s/build errors are resolved across the site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build and publish (deploy) the current PATIL Construction website version to production, ensuring the deployment completes successfully without build-time errors (TypeScript compile errors, missing imports, missing static assets, or invalid paths).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows component code/content changes; it contains no evidence of an actual production deployment, build pipeline updates, or verification that TypeScript compilation is error-free and all referenced assets resolve at runtime across the app.

hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 focuses on build/deploy success and resolving build/runtime errors; this marketing attribution/tracking content is not requested and conflicts with the stated non-goal of no content changes beyond what is required to build/publish.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-23; these are feature/content additions rather than explicit build/deploy fixes based on the provided diff summary.
